title: Ultimate Ritualist

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only use one ability each night.
- You have a layer of Basic defense that can prevent one attack.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose the game.

desc:
Post 1308
*Fool! Heretic! Now, however, you know you are not evil. Sacrifice the Jailor to random shoot Night 1.*
